title: TSP-15-GetToken Response Schema
description: Schema for authentication token response provided to TSP by RMP

access_token.description: The access token to be used in subsequent API calls.

expires_in.description: Number of seconds until the access token expires.

refresh_expires_in.description: Number of seconds until the issued token expires.

refresh_token.description: A refresh token. Not relevant for CWT.

token_type.description: The type of access token provided.

id_token.description: A token containing identifty information about the authetnicated party. Not relevant for CWT.

not-before-policy.description: Unix timestamp in seconds before which this token will not be accepted. Not relevant for CWT.

session_state.description: A session state management identifier. Not relevant for CWT.
